EmailTemplate.name: Request a Trial.Marketo Follow-up - Email 2 (Manual Testing with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.subject: Manual Testing with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Manual Testing with Tosca Testsuite
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Are Manual Test Cases important to your test projects? If so, check out how Tosca Testsuite allows you to manage manual Test Cases individually as well as in combination with your automated test portfolio.
Learn more about Manual Testing with Tosca Testsuite here: - Hands-on Manual Test Tutorial <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm?#trial/manual_tests.htm%3FTocPath%3DTutorials%7CTRIAL%2520Tour%7C_____4>
- Working with Manual Test Cases Guide <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm?#tchb/manual_testcases.htm>
- How to Execute Manual Tests Video <https://documentation.tricentis.com/videos/en/manual_testexecution/manual_testexecution.html>
Hope you’ve found this helpful! More useful tips are headed your way! Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricents.com>
Product and Licensing For further questions regarding product or licensing, please contact our Tricentis sales team: Website <http://innovate.tricentis.com/talk-with-sales.html> | e-mail <mailto:sales@tricentis.com>
